mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_design (design_id, design_name, teacher_id, create_time, file_address, file_name, enable_status) VALUES (#{designID}, #{designName}, #{teacherID}, #{createTime}, #{fileAddress}, #{fileName}, #{enableStatus})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_design WHERE design_id = #{designID} AND teacher_id = #{teacherID}
mapper.select: SELECT design_id, design_name, teacher_id, create_time, file_address, file_name, enable_status FROM tb_design WHERE enable_status = -1 OR enable_status = 0
